name: A-Gents (itch)
description:
A-Gents is the squad of highly trained operatives and bounty hunters. Join Sean and Emma in this dynamic, non-stop-action game. Storm the compounds of contraband dealers and smugglers around the globe, and collect goodies.

Key features
  • Various playable characters
  • Local co-op for two players
  • Numerous types of weapons
  • Special missions with controlling and protecting vehicles
  • Original soundtrack

We appreciate any feedback and suggestions, and we will sure consider them while improving the game.

Steam Store Link
